name: Adaptability
effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

name: Aerilate
effect: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type and receive a 30% power boost.

name: Aftermath
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability faints due to damage from a move that makes contact, the attacking Pokémon takes damage equal to 1/4 of its max HP.

name: Air Lock
effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

name: Analytic
effect: Increases the power of moves by 30% when moving last.

name: Anger Point
effect: Maxes the Attack stat after receiving a critical hit.

name: Anticipation
effect: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a “super-effective” move, Self-Destruct, Explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

name: Arena Trap
effect:
Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out. Does not affect Flying-type and Pokémon with Levitate.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

name: Aroma Veil
effect: Prevents the Pokémon with this Ability and its allies from being afflicted by Taunt, Torment, Encore, Disable, Cursed Body, Heal Block, and infatuation.

name: As One
effect: Prevents the opposing Pokémon from eating berries and raises its Attack (Ice Raider) or Special Attack stat (Shadow Raider) by one stage upon KO'ing a target.

name: Aura Break
effect: Makes Dark Aura and Fairy Aura weaken moves of their respective types to 2/3 their power.

name: Bad Dreams
effect: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 of their max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Ball Fetch
effect: If the Pokémon with Ball Fetch isn't holding an item, it'll retrieve the first Poké Ball that failed to catch a Pokémon at the end of a turn.

name: Battery
effect: Raises the power of allies' special moves by 30%.

name: Battle Armor
effect: Prevents the opponent from landing a critical hit.

name: Battle Bond
effect: Changes Greninja into Ash-Greninja after it knocks out a Pokémon. If Ash-Greninja uses Water Shuriken, the move's power becomes 20 and it always hits three times. When the battle ends, Greninja reverts to its original form.

name: Beast Boost
effect: Raises the Pokémon's highest stat (other than HP) by one stage each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

name: Berserk
effect: Raises Special Attack stat by one stage when HP drops below 50%.

name: Big Pecks
effect: Prevents Defense stat from being lowered by other Pokémon.

name: Blaze
effect: Increases the power of Fire-type moves by 50% at 1/3 max HP or less.

name: Bulletproof
effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
effect: Restores 33% of max HP upon eating a Berry, in addition to the Berry's effect.

name: Chilling Neigh
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a target.

name: Chlorophyll
effect: Doubles Speed stat during harsh sunlight.

name: Clear Body
effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

name: Cloud Nine
effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

name: Color Change
effect: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move that it was hit by.

name: Comatose
effect: Keeps the Pokémon perpetually in a drowsing state, which prevents it from getting any other status conditions.

name: Competitive
effect: Raises Special Attack stat by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

name: Compound Eyes
effect:
Increases moves' accuracy by 30%.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chances of finding a wild Pokémon holding an item increase from 50% to 60% (for common items), 5% to 20% (for uncommon items).

name: Contrary
effect: Inverts stat changes.

name: Corrosion
effect: Allows the user to inflict poison on any Pokémon regardless of type.

name: Cotton Down
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a damaging move, the Speed stat of all other Pokémon is decreased by one stage.

name: Curious Medicine
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability enters the battle, allies’ stat changes are reset.

name: Cursed Body
effect: Has a 30% chance of disabling any move that hits the Pokémon with this Ability for 4 turns.

name: Cute Charm
effect:
Has a 30% chance of infatuating the attacking Pokémon with opposite gender on contact.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering a Pokémon of the opposite gender is 66,7%.

name: Damp
effect: Prevents Self-Destruct, Explosion, Mind Blown, Misty Explosion and Aftermath from working.

name: Dancer
effect: If another Pokémon in the field uses a dancing move, the Pokémon with this Ability will immediately use that move as well.

name: Dark Aura
effect: Increases the damage dealt by Dark-type moves by 33% for all Pokémon on the field.

name: Dauntless Shield
effect: Raises Defense stat by one stage upon entering battle.

name: Dazzling
effect: Prevents opponents from using priority moves that normally strike first.

name: Defeatist
effect: Halves the user's Attack and Special Attack stats at 50% max HP or less.

name: Defiant
effect: Raises Attack stat by two stages upon having any stat lowered.

name: Delta Stream
effect: Creates strong winds to eliminate all of the Flying type’s weaknesses upon entering battle.

name: Desolate Land
effect: Creates extremely harsh sunlight to nullify Water-type moves upon entering battle.

name: Disguise
effect: Prevents damage from a single attack. After that, Mimikyu changes into Busted Form and loses 1/8 of its max HP.

name: Download
effect: Raises either Attack or Special Attack stat by one stage base on the opponent's defenses upon entering battle.

name: Dragon's Maw
effect: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves by 50%.

name: Drizzle
effect: Summons rain that lasts for five turns upon entering battle.

name: Drought
effect: Summons harsh sunlight that lasts for five turns upon entering battle.

name: Dry Skin
effect: The user loses 1/8 of its max HP each turn during harsh sunlight, but recovers 1/8 of max HP during rain. Increases the damage taken from Fire-type moves by 25%, but absorbs Water-type moves, restores 1/4 of max HP.

name: Early Bird
effect: Causes quick awakening from sleep.

name: Effect Spore
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance that the attacking Pokémon will become either poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

name: Electric Surge
effect: The field turns into Electric Terrain, boosting the power of any Electric-type moves used by Pokémon on the ground by 30% and preventing them from falling asleep.

name: Emergency Exit
effect: Switches out when HP drops below 50%.

name: Fairy Aura
effect: Increases the damage dealt by Fairy-type moves by 33% for all Pokémon on the field.

name: Filter
effect: Reduces the damage taken from “super-effective” moves by 25%.

name: Flame Body
effect:
Has a 30% chance of burning the attacking Pokémon on contact.
Overworld: If a Pokémon with Flame Body is in the party, the number of steps required to hatch the egg are halved.

name: Flare Boost
effect: Increases the power of special moves by 50% when burned.

name: Flash Fire
effect:
Immune to Fire-type moves. When activated, the power of the user's Fire-type moves is increased by 50%.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering a Fire-type wild Pokémon increases by 50%.

name: Flower Gift
effect: Changes Cherrim into Sunshine Form during harsh sunlight, raises the Attack and Special Defense stats of all party Pokémon by 50%.

name: Flower Veil
effect: Protects the user and its Grass-type allies from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

name: Fluffy
effect: Halves the damage taken from moves that make contact, but takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

name: Forecast
effect: Changes Castform's type and form to match the weather.

name: Forewarn
effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

name: Friend Guard
effect: Reduces the damage received by allies by 25%.

name: Frisk
effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

name: Full Metal Body
effect: The Pokémon’s stats can not be lowered by the effects of an opponent’s moves or Ability.

name: Fur Coat
effect: Doubles Defense stat.

name: Gale Wings
effect: Increases the priority of Flying-type moves by +1.

name: Galvanize
effect: Turns all Normal-type moves into Electric-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Gluttony
effect: Causes the Pokémon to eat Berries that would normally be eaten at 25% HP or lower at 50% HP or lower instead.

name: Gooey
effect: Lowers the attacking Pokémon's Speed stat by one stage on contact.

name: Gorilla Tactics
effect: Increases Attack stat by 50%, but limits the Pokémon to using only one move.

name: Grass Pelt
effect: Increases Defense stat by 50% on Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Surge
effect: The field turns into Grassy Terrain, boosting the power of any Grass-type moves used by Pokémon on the ground by 30% and restoring a bit of HP to them each turn. It also halves the damage taken from Earthquake, Magnitude, and Bulldoze.

name: Grim Neigh
effect: Raises Special Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a target.

name: Gulp Missile
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

name: Guts
effect: While the Pokémon with this Ability has a status condition, its Attack stat is increased by 50%. It also does not lose Attack due to burn.

name: Harvest
effect:
Has a 50% chance (100% chance during harsh sunlight) of restoring a used Berry at the end of each turn.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering a Grass-type wild Pokémon increases by 50%.

name: Healer
effect: Has a 30% chance of curing an adjacent ally's status condition at the end of each turn.

name: Heatproof
effect: Halves damage from Fire-type moves and burns.

name: Heavy Metal
effect: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

name: Honey Gather
effect: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.

name: Huge Power
effect: Doubles Attack stat in battle.

name: Hunger Switch
effect: Causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode. Morpeko's form also changes the type of its signature move, Aura Wheel.

name: Hustle
effect:
Increases Attack stat by 50%, but lowers the accuracy of physical moves by 20%. Special moves and status moves are unaffected by Hustler.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, wild Pokémon are 50% more likely to be higher level.

name: Hydration
effect: Heals status conditions at the end of each turn during rain.

name: Hyper Cutter
effect: Prevents Attack stat from being lowered by other Pokémon, blocks Intimidate.

name: Ice Body
effect: Restores 1/16 of max HP at the end of each turn during hail. Protects against hail damage.

name: Ice Face
effect: Prevents damage from a single physical attack. After that, Eiscue changes into Noice Face form. The Ice Face can be restored once per battle at the end of a turn during hail.

name: Ice Scales
effect: Halves the damage taken from special moves.

name: Illuminate
effect:
No effect.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

name: Illusion
effect: Takes the name and appearance of the last non-fainted Pokémon of the player's party upon entering battle.

name: Immunity
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from being poisoned.

name: Imposter
effect: Transforms into the opponent it's facing upon entering battle.

name: Infiltrator
effect:
Moves used by the Pokémon with this Ability bypass the effects of targets' Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, Aurora Veil and Substitute. Prevents accuracy from being lowered.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

name: Innards Out
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability faints, it deals damage to the opponent equal to amount of damage it took on the final blow.

name: Inner Focus
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from flinching and blocks Intimidate

name: Insomnia
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

name: Intimidate
effect:
Lowers the opponents' Attack stat by one stage upon entering battle. Does not affect Inner Focus, Oblivious, Scrappy, or Own Tempo. Intimidate also triggers Rattled.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, wild Pokémon are 50% less likely to be lower level.

name: Intrepid Sword
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon entering battle.

name: Iron Barbs
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacking Pokémon takes damage equal to 1/8 of its max HP.

name: Iron Fist
effect: Increases the power of punching moves by 20%.

name: Justified
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon taking damage from a Dark-type move.

name: Keen Eye
effect:
Prevents accuracy from being lowered and ignores the target's evasion stages.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, wild Pokémon are 50% less likely to be lower level.

name: Klutz
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.

name: Leaf Guard
effect: Protects against major status ailments during harsh sunlight.

name: Levitate
effect: Immune to Ground-type moves, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, Rototiller, Arena Trap and terrain effects.

name: Libero
effect: Changes the user's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

name: Light Metal
effect: Halves the Pokémon's weight.

name: Lightning Rod
effect:
Redirects single-target Electric-type moves to this Pokémon. Absorbs Electric-type moves, raising Special Attack stat by one stage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering an Electric-type wild Pokémon increases by 50%.

name: Limber
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from being paralyzed.

name: Liquid Ooze
effect: Causes HP-draining moves used on the Pokémon with this Ability to damage their user instead of healing them.

name: Liquid Voice
effect: Turns all sound-based moves into Water-type moves.

name: Long Reach
effect: If the Pokémon uses a contact move, it will not activate any effects caused by contact.

name: Magic Bounce
effect: Reflects most of non-damaging moves back to the user.

name: Magic Guard
effect: Prevents damage caused by effects.

name: Magician
effect: Steals the target's held item when the Pokémon with this Ability uses a damaging move.

name: Magma Armor
effect:
Prevents the Pokémon from being frostbitten.
Overworld: If a Pokémon with Magma Armor is in the party, the number of steps required to hatch the egg are halved.

name: Magnet Pull
effect:
Prevents Steel-type opponents from fleeing or switching out.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering a Steel-type wild Pokémon increases by 50%.

name: Marvel Scale
effect: Increases Defense stat by 50% if the user has a status condition.

name: Mega Launcher
effect: Increases the power of aura and pulse moves by 50%. Heal Pulse heals 75% of the target's max HP.

name: Merciless
effect: The user's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

name: Mimicry
effect: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

name: Minus
effect: Increases Special Attack stat by 50% if an ally has Plus or Minus.

name: Mirror Armor
effect: Reflects the stat-lowering effects of moves and Abilities back to the user.

name: Misty Surge
effect: The field turns into Misty Terrain, halving the damage taken by Pokémon on the ground from Dragon-type moves and preventing them from being afflicted with status conditions or confusion.

name: Mold Breaker
effect: Prevents a target's Ability from affecting moves that the Mold Breaker Pokémon uses.

name: Moody
effect: Raises a random stat by two stages and lowers another by one stage at the end of each turn. It does not select evasion or accuracy.

name: Motor Drive
effect: Raises Speed stat by one stage if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.

name: Moxie
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a Pokémon.

name: Multiscale
effect: Halves damage taken at full HP.

name: Multitype
effect: Changes Arceus' type to match its held Plate or Z-Crystal.

name: Mummy
effect: Changes the attacking Pokémon's Ability to Mummy on contact.

name: Natural Cure
effect:
Heals any status conditions upon switching out.
Overworld: Natural Cure automatically heals status conditions upon the end of a battle.

name: Neuroforce
effect: Increases the power of “super-effective” moves by 25%.

name: Neutralizing Gas
effect: Suppresses the effects of Abilities of other Pokémon currently in battle.

name: No Guard
effect:
Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon with this Ability hit without fail.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

name: Normalize
effect: Turns all moves used by the Pokémon with this Ability into Normal-type and receive a 20% power boost.

name: Oblivious
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from being infatuated, protects against Captivate, Taunt and Intimidate.

name: Overcoat
effect: Protects against damage from weather, also protects the user from powder and spore moves, as well as Effect Spore.

name: Overgrow
effect: Increases the power of Grass-type moves by 50% at 1/3 max HP or less.

name: Own Tempo
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from being confused and blocks Intimidate.

name: Parental Bond
effect: Allows the user to attack twice. The second attack hits with 25% of the power.

name: Pastel Veil
effect: Protects the Pokémon and its ally from being poisoned.

name: Perish Body
effect: When hit by a move that makes contact, the Pokémon with this Ability and the attacker will faint in three turns.

name: Pickpocket
effect: When hit by a move that makes contact, the Pokémon with this Ability will steal the held item of the attacking Pokémon.

name: Pickup
effect:
Collects the item that other Pokémon consumed in battle.
Overworld: When a battle ends, any party Pokémon with Pickup has a 10% chance of picking up an item (if they are not already holding an item).

name: Pixilate
effect: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type and receive a 30% power boost.

name: Plus
effect: Increases Special Attack stat by 50% if an ally has Minus or Plus.

name: Poison Heal
effect: Restores 1/8 of max HP at the end of each turn if the Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Poison Point
effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning the attacking Pokémon on contact.

name: Poison Touch
effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning the target on contact.

name: Power Construct
effect: Changes Zygarde 10% Forme or Zygarde 50% Forme into Zygarde Complete Forme when its HP drops below 50%.

name: Power of Alchemy
effect: When an ally of the Pokémon with this Ability faints in battle, Power of Alchemy will be replaced by the fainted Pokémon's Ability.

name: Power Spot
effect: Increases the power of allies' moves by 30%.

name: Prankster
effect: Increases the priority of status moves by +1. Moves increased by this that are used on Dark-type opponents will fail.

name: Pressure
effect:
Increases the PP cost of moves that targetting the Pokémon with this Ability by one.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, wild Pokémon are 50% more likely to be higher level.

name: Primordial Sea
effect: Creates heavy rain to nullify Fire-type moves upon entering battle.

name: Prism Armor
effect: Reduces the damage taken from “super-effective” moves by 25%.

name: Propeller Tail
effect: Makes the user's moves ignore the target-redirecting effects of moves and Abilities.

name: Protean
effect: Changes the user's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

name: Psychic Surge
effect: The field turns into Psychic Terrain, boosting the power of any Psychic-type moves used by Pokémon on the ground by 30% and preventing them from being hit by priority moves.

name: Punk Rock
effect: Increases the power of sound-based moves by 30%. The user also takes half damage from damaging sound-based moves.

name: Pure Power
effect: Doubles Attack stat in battle.

name: Queenly Majesty
effect: Prevents opponents from using priority moves.

name: Quick Draw
effect: Has a 30% chance of moving first with a damaging move. (44% chance if the user's holding Quick Claw).

name: Quick Feet
effect:
Increases Speed stat by 50% if the user has a status condition.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

name: Rain Dish
effect: Restores 1/16 of max HP at the end of each turn during rain.

name: Rattled
effect: Raises Speed stat by one stage upon being hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type damaging move. Also activates if the Pokémon with this Ability is affected by Intimidate.

name: Receiver
effect: When an ally of the Pokémon with this Ability faints in battle, Receiver will be replaced by the fainted Pokémon's Ability.

name: Reckless
effect: Increases the power of moves that have recoil or crash damage by 20%.

name: Refrigerate
effect: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type and receive a 30% power boost.

name: Regenerator
effect: Restores 1/3 of max HP upon switching out.

name: Ripen
effect: Doubles the effects of held Berries when eaten in battle.

name: Rivalry
effect: Increases damage by 25% against the same gender target, but decreases damage by 25% against the opposite gender.

name: RKS System
effect: Changes Silvally's type to match its held Memory Disk.

name: Rock Head
effect: Prevents recoil damage from moves.

name: Rough Skin
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a move that makes contact, the attacking Pokémon takes damage equal to 1/8 of its max HP.

name: Run Away
effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

name: Sand Force
effect: Increases the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves by 30% during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.

name: Sand Rush
effect: Doubles Speed stat during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.

name: Sand Spit
effect: Summons a sandstorm that lasts for five turns when hit by a damaging move.

name: Sand Stream
effect: Summons a sandstorm that lasts for five turns upon entering battle.

name: Sand Veil
effect:
Increases evasion by 20% during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

name: Sap Sipper
effect: Absorbs Grass-type moves, raising Attack stat by one stage.

name: Schooling
effect: Changes Wishiwashi into School Form if its HP is above 25% and is at least level 20. If its HP drops below 25%, Wishiwashi will revert back to Solo Form.

name: Scrappy
effect: Allows Normal- and Fighting-type moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon, blocks Intimidate.

name: Screen Cleaner
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability is sent out, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil end on both sides of the field.

name: Serene Grace
effect: Doubles the chance of moves' secondary effects.

name: Shadow Shield
effect: Halves damage taken at full HP.

name: Shadow Tag
effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

name: Shed Skin
effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status condition at the end of each turn.

name: Sheer Force
effect: Increases the power of moves that have beneficial secondary effects by 30%, but removes those additional effects.

name: Shell Armor
effect: Prevents the opponent from landing a critical hit.

name: Shield Dust
effect: Protects against additional effects of damaging moves.

name: Shields Down
effect: Changes Minior into Core Form when its HP drops below 50%. Before then, it cannot be affected by status conditions such as burn or paralysis.

name: Simple
effect: Doubles the number of stages of all stat changes.

name: Skill Link
effect: Causes multi-strike moves to always hit five times.

name: Slow Start
effect: Halves Attack and Speed stats for five turns upon entering battle.

name: Slush Rush
effect: Doubles Speed stat during a hailstorm. The Pokémon with this Ability still takes damage from hail unless it is Ice-type.

name: Sniper
effect: Increases the power of critical hits by 1.5×. This means a critical hit will deal 2.25× damage.

name: Snow Cloak
effect:
Increases evasion by 20% during a hailstorm. Protects against hail damage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a hailstorm.

name: Snow Warning
effect: Summons a hailstorm that lasts for five turns upon entering battle.

name: Solar Power
effect: Increases Special Attack stat by 50% but loses 1/8 of max HP at the end of each turn during harsh sunlight.

name: Solid Rock
effect: Reduces the damage taken from “super-effective” moves by 25%.

name: Soul-Heart
effect: Raises Special Attack stat by one stage every time a Pokémon faints.

name: Soundproof
effect: Protects against sound-based moves.

name: Speed Boost
effect: Raises Speed stat by one stage at the end of each turn.

name: Stakeout
effect: Doubles the damage dealt to the targets that have switched in mid-battle.

name: Stall
effect: The Pokémon always moves last.

name: Stalwart
effect: Makes the user's moves ignore the target-redirecting effects of moves and Abilities.

name: Stamina
effect: Raises Defense stat by one stage when hit by an attack.

name: Stance Change
effect: Changes Aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using King's Shield.

name: Static
effect:
Has a 30% chance of paralyzing the attacking Pokémon on contact. This can affect Ground-type Pokémon.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering an Electric-type wild Pokémon increases by 50%.

name: Steadfast
effect: Raises Speed stat by one stage when flinched.

name: Steam Engine
effect:
Raises Speed stat by six stages when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
Overworld: If a Pokémon with Steam Engine is in the party, the number of steps required to hatch the egg are halved.

name: Steelworker
effect: Increases the power of Steel-type moves by 50%.

name: Steely Spirit
effect: Increases the power of Steel-type moves used by the user and its allies by 50%.

name: Stench
effect:
Has a 10% chance of causing the opponent to flinch when hit by a damaging move.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

name: Sticky Hold
effect:
Prevents held items from being taken or switched by other Pokémon.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the encounter rate while fishing is increased.

name: Storm Drain
effect:
Redirects single-target Water-type moves to this Pokémon. Absorbs Water-type moves, raising Special Attack stat by one stage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chance of encountering a Water-type wild Pokémon increases by 50%.

name: Strong Jaw
effect: Increases the power of biting moves by 50%.

name: Sturdy
effect: Prevents being KO'ed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Prevents One-Hit-KO moves.

name: Suction Cups
effect:
Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the encounter rate while fishing is increased.

name: Super Luck
effect:
Raises the critical-hit ratio by one stage.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the chances of finding a wild Pokémon holding an item increase from 50% to 60% (for common items), 5% to 20% (for uncommon items).

name: Surge Surfer
effect: Doubles Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Swarm
effect: Increases the power of Bug-type moves by 50% at 1/3 max HP or less.

name: Sweet Veil
effect: Prevents the Pokémon with this Ability and its allies from falling asleep.

name: Swift Swim
effect: Doubles Speed stat in rain.

name: Symbiosis
effect: Passes the user's hold item to an ally that has used up an item.

name: Synchronize
effect:
When the Pokémon with this Ability is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, wild Pokémon are guaranteed to have the same Nature as the leading Pokémon.

name: Tangled Feet
effect: Doubles evasion when confused.

name: Tangling Hair
effect: Lowers the attacking Pokémon's Speed stat by one stage on contact.

name: Technician
effect: Increases the power of moves that have a base power of 60 or less by 50%.

name: Telepathy
effect: Protects against allies' damaging moves.

name: Teravolt
effect: Prevents a target's Ability from affecting moves that the Teravolt Pokémon uses.

name: Thick Fat
effect: Halves damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

name: Tinted Lens
effect: Doubles the damage done by “not very effective” moves.

name: Torrent
effect: Increases the power of Water-type moves by 50% at 1/3 max HP or less.

name: Tough Claws
effect: Increases the power of moves that make contact by 30%.

name: Toxic Boost
effect: Increases Attack stat by 50% when poisoned.

name: Trace
effect: Copies an opponent's Ability upon entering battle.

name: Transistor
effect: Increases the power of Electric-type moves by 50%.

name: Triage
effect: Increases the priority of HP-restoring moves by +3.

name: Truant
effect: Skips every second turn.

name: Turboblaze
effect: Prevents a target's Ability from affecting moves that the Turboblaze Pokémon uses.

name: Unaware
effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat changes for damage and accuracy calculation.

name: Unburden
effect: Doubles Speed stat upon using or losing a held item.

name: Unnerve
effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

name: Unseen Fist
effect: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

name: Victory Star
effect: Increases moves' accuracy by 10% for the user and its allies.

name: Vital Spirit
effect:
Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, wild Pokémon are 50% more likely to be higher level.

name: Volt Absorb
effect: Absorbs Electric-type moves, restores 1/4 of max HP.

name: Wandering Spirit
effect: Swaps Abilities with opponents on contact.

name: Water Absorb
effect: Absorbs Water-type moves, restores 1/4 of max HP.

name: Water Bubble
effect: Halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves, and doubles the power of Water-type moves used by the Pokémon with this Ability. It also prevents the Pokémon from being burned.

name: Water Compaction
effect: Raises Defense stat by two stages when hit by a Water-type move.

name: Water Veil
effect: Prevents the Pokémon from being burned.

name: Weak Armor
effect: Raises Speed stat by two stages and lowers Defense stat by one stage upon being hit by a physical move.

name: White Smoke
effect:
Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.
Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this Ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

name: Wimp Out
effect: Causes the user to switch out (or flee in a wild battle) when its HP drops below 50%.

name: Wonder Guard
effect: Prevents damage from damaging moves unless they are “super-effective”.

name: Wonder Skin
effect: Halves the accuracy of all status moves targeted at the Pokémon with this Ability.

name: Zen Mode
effect: Changes Darmanitan into Zen Mode when its HP drops below 50%.

name: Portal Power
effect: Reduces the power of non-contact moves by 25%.

name: Nine Lives
effect: Prevents being KO'ed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Prevents One-Hit-KO moves.

name: Focus Belt
effect: Prevents being KO'ed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Prevents One-Hit-KO moves.

name: Fiery Neigh
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a Pokémon.

name: Shocking Neigh
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a Pokémon.

name: Pride
effect: Raises Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a Pokémon.

name: Multieye
effect: Halves damage taken at full HP.

name: Subterfuge
effect: Changes the user's type to the type of the move it's about to use.

name: Tangling Wool
effect: Lowers the attacking Pokémon's Speed stat by one stage on contact.

name: Brain Bond
effect: Allows the user to attack twice. The second attack hits with 25% of the power.

name: Cotton Cloud
effect: When the Pokémon with this Ability is hit by a damaging move, the Speed stat of all other Pokémon is decreased by one stage.

name: Bellow
effect: Increases the power of sound-based moves by 30%. The user also takes half damage from damaging sound-based moves.

name: Sound Waves
effect: Increases the power of sound-based moves by 30%. The user also takes half damage from damaging sound-based moves.

name: Icy Skin
effect: Halves the damage taken from special moves.

name: Dusty Scales
effect: Halves the damage taken from special moves.

name: Crabby Tactics
effect: Increases Attack stat by 50%, but limits the Pokémon to using only one move.

name: Honey Armor
effect: Raises Defense stat by one stage upon entering battle.

name: Drill Beak
effect: Drill moves always land a critical hits.

name: Evaporate
effect: Nullifies Water-type moves, raising Special Attack stat by one stage.

name: Grass Dash
effect: Increases the priority of Grass-type moves by +1.

name: Slippery Tail
effect: Increases the priority of Tail moves by +1.

name: Face Shield
effect: Raises Defense stat by one stage upon entering battle.

name: Royal Roar
effect: Raises Special Attack stat by one stage upon KO'ing a target.
